Detailed Description

Manages status details. This is to be used as a base class.

Member Data Documentation

std::vector<std::pair<string, string> > Details::m_details [private]

The std::vector that holds the key:value pairs. The key is the component such as "chan1x" or "dx1000", The value is the full status line.
